f5f62a1c-c847-493c-89f7-06bd383a2025.name: EVCC: Energien aufsummiert über die Zeit

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") /1000 from gridDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter  tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT sum("value") /1000 from pvDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter  tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT sum("value") /1000 from homeDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT sum("value") /1000 from loadpoint1DailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT sum("value") /1000 from loadpoint2DailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT sum("value") /1000 from feedInDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT sum("value") /1000 from pvDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT sum("value") /1000 from gridDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT sum("value") /1000 from feedInDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT sum("value") /1000 from homeDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT sum("value") /1000 from carDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT sum("value") from chargeDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter  tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT sum("value") from dischargeDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter  tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT max("value") FROM "batterySoc" WHERE ("value"::field < 101) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)  tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT min("value") FROM "batterySoc" WHERE ("value"::field < 101) AND ("value"::field > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)  tz('Europe/Berlin')

libraryPanel.name: EVCC: Energien aufsummiert über die Zeit

targets.query: SELECT value as "Erzeugt von PV" FROM "pvMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value as "Zugekauft" FROM "gridMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value * (-1) as "Haus" FROM "homeMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value * (-1) as "Garage" FROM "loadpoint1MonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value * (-1) as "Stellplatz" FROM "loadpoint2MonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value * (-1) as "Eingespeist" FROM "feedInMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value FROM "gridMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value FROM "carMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value FROM "homeMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter  tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value FROM "pvMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value FROM "feedInMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value FROM "pvDailyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value FROM "feedInDailyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value FROM "homeDailyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value FROM "pvDailyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value FROM "homeDailyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT value FROM "gridDailyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT "value" FROM "pvDailyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT "value" FROM "homeDailyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT "value" FROM "gridDailyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT max("value") FROM "batterySoc" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT min("value") FROM "batterySoc" WHERE $timeFilter AND value  > 0 GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT "value" from chargeMonthlyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT "value" from dischargeMonthlyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('Europe/Berlin')
